content:
Excellent decision to prioritize your exercise routine! Fitting in a quick workout can help increase your energy levels and set a positive tone for the day.

Let's adjust the schedule to accommodate your exercise routine and morning routine:

* 7:15 am - 7:45 am: Exercise routine
* 7:45 am - 8:30 am: Shower and get ready
* 8:30 am - 9:00 am: Have a quick breakfast and get settled
* 9:00 am - 9:30 am: Respond to urgent emails
* 9:30 am - 10:00 am: Prepare for your phone call (review notes, gather materials, etc.)
* 10:00 am - 12:30 pm: Work on your side project (creative block)
* 12:30 pm - 1:30 pm: Take a break (grab lunch, stretch, recharge)
* 1:30 pm - 2:00 pm: Make the phone call
* 2:00 pm onwards: Respond to remaining emails or tackle other tasks

This revised schedule should allow you to fit in your exercise routine, morning routine, and still have a productive morning. Remember to stay hydrated and fueled throughout the day to help combat your low energy levels.

How does this revised schedule look to you?
